page.description: Specify the show/hide expression for the field.

discussion.p: The show/hide expression can refer to session variables (but NOT to fields in the current row). Data for the field is retrieved from the server if the expression is true. If the expression is false, or invalid (perhaps because a referenced session variable has not yet been defined), the field is not shown. Example expressions:

page.note: This option is not available if this List is the parent of a child List and it pre-fetches the data for the child List.
